conversations.content: Can you help me stop the obsolete-bot agent that's still running?

tool_call: agentManager_toggleAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732107100000_t2u3v4w5x", "workspaceId": "ws_1732107100000_x5y6z7a8b", "sessionDescription": "Stopping agent", "sessionMemory": "Previously attempted to stop obsolete-bot but it remained active in background. System flagged error that agent is still running in session. Need to force disable the service.", "toolContext": "Using agentManager_toggleAgent to disable obsolete-bot after confirming it was still active. This approach ensures the agent is properly deregistered before any cleanup operations.", "primaryGoal": "Clean up obsolete agents from workspace", "subgoal": "Force disable the obsolete-bot agent"}, "id": "agent_1732000000000_o2b3s4o5l"}
Can you search for all function definitions in the utils directory so we can catalog them?

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732107400000_w5x6y7z8a", "workspaceId": "ws_1732107400000_a8b9c0d1e", "sessionDescription": "Finding functions", "sessionMemory": "Previous code review identified need to catalog all utility functions. Team discovered 47 existing utilities spread across utils directory. Need to locate all function definitions including arrow functions and export statements.", "toolContext": "Using vaultLibrarian_searchContent with regex patterns to locate function declarations. This search-first approach allows us to understand full scope before refactoring or documentation.", "primaryGoal": "Create complete function inventory for utilities", "subgoal": "Search for and list all function definitions in utils"}, "query": "function |const.*=.*=>|export.*function", "paths": ["/utils"]}
Please execute a code quality analysis prompt to identify areas for improvement.

tool_call: agentManager_executePrompt
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732108000000_c1d2e3f4g", "workspaceId": "ws_1732108000000_g4h5i6j7k", "sessionDescription": "Running quality check", "sessionMemory": "Codebase has grown to 23 modules. Last quality review was 3 weeks ago with 8 identified issues. Maintainability concerns raised in recent team meeting about code complexity and readability scores.", "toolContext": "Executing agentManager_executePrompt with quality analysis to generate fresh assessment. This systematic approach provides benchmark metrics for tracking improvement over time.", "primaryGoal": "Assess and improve overall code quality", "subgoal": "Run comprehensive quality analysis on codebase"}, "prompt": "Analyze the codebase for code quality issues, focusing on maintainability, readability, and best practices"}
Can you help me find all test files that contain 'integration' in their name?

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732108200000_e3f4g5h6i", "workspaceId": "ws_1732108200000_i6j7k8l9m", "sessionDescription": "Finding integration tests", "sessionMemory": "Test suite was recently expanded with 12 new integration tests added last sprint. Coverage gaps identified in API layer. Need to create inventory of existing integration tests to assess coverage and plan additional ones.", "toolContext": "Using vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory to locate all integration test files by name pattern. This inventory helps identify coverage gaps and prevents duplicate test creation.", "primaryGoal": "Assess test coverage across integration layer", "subgoal": "Find and inventory all integration test files"}, "query": "*integration*.test.*", "paths": ["/tests"]}
I need to search the entire vault for references to the old domain name so we can migrate everything.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732109100000_n2o3p4q5r", "workspaceId": "ws_1732109100000_r5s6t7u8v", "sessionDescription": "Finding old domain", "sessionMemory": "Domain migration project started 2 weeks ago. Marketing already updated external links. Found 23 hardcoded references in config files. Need to locate all remaining instances including comments, URLs in documentation, and test fixtures.", "toolContext": "Using vaultLibrarian_searchContent with regex to find all oldsite.com references before migration. Complete inventory ensures no broken links or configuration mismatches after cutover.", "primaryGoal": "Complete domain migration from old to new", "subgoal": "Identify all references to old domain in codebase"}, "query": "oldsite\\\\.com"}
I just successfully created the backup-manager agent. Can you enable it to start the backup processes?

tool_call: agentManager_toggleAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732109300000_p4q5r6s7t", "workspaceId": "ws_1732109300000_t7u8v9w0x", "sessionDescription": "Enabling backup agent", "sessionMemory": "Successfully instantiated backup-manager agent with 4-hour interval schedule. Configuration includes daily full backups and hourly incremental backups. Ready to activate for production use immediately.", "toolContext": "Using agentManager_toggleAgent to enable backup-manager after successful configuration. Activation initializes the backup workflow and ensures production data protection resumes.", "primaryGoal": "Enable automated backup processes", "subgoal": "Activate backup-manager agent for production"}, "id": "agent_1732109200000_b1a2c3k4u"}
Please update the description of the current session to reflect what we're actually working on.

tool_call: memoryManager_updateSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732109600000_s7t8u9v0w", "workspaceId": "ws_1732109600000_w0x1y2z3a", "sessionDescription": "Updating session info", "sessionMemory": "Session started for code refactoring initiative. Team completed performance profiling showing 23% improvement needed in critical path. Focused on optimization priorities identified in sprint planning meeting.", "toolContext": "Using memoryManager_updateSession to document refactoring focus. Accurate session description helps team understand context when reviewing session logs and planning followup work.", "primaryGoal": "Document and track code refactoring session", "subgoal": "Update session description with refactoring goals"}, "sessionId": "session_1732109600000_s7t8u9v0w", "description": "Code refactoring and optimization session", "sessionGoal": "Improve code quality and performance"}
Can you analyze the codebase for cyclomatic complexity and help identify functions that need refactoring?

tool_call: agentManager_executePrompt
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732110200000_y3z4a5b6c", "workspaceId": "ws_1732110200000_c6d7e8f9g", "sessionDescription": "Analyzing complexity", "sessionMemory": "Recent code review flagged 8 functions with high cyclomatic complexity. Identified monolithic methods combining 5-7 distinct responsibilities. Refactoring roadmap created with priority list based on usage frequency and impact.", "toolContext": "Executing agentManager_executePrompt to perform systematic complexity analysis. This identifies refactoring candidates before manual code review, ensuring engineering effort targets highest impact areas.", "primaryGoal": "Improve code maintainability through refactoring", "subgoal": "Analyze complexity and identify refactoring candidates"}, "prompt": "Analyze the codebase for cyclomatic complexity and identify functions that should be refactored"}
I need to catalog all media files in our images directory for the content audit.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732110900000_f0g1h2i3j", "workspaceId": "ws_1732110900000_j3k4l5m6n", "sessionDescription": "Finding images", "sessionMemory": "Content audit discovered inconsistent image naming conventions across 47 files. Previous attempt found only PNG files. Need comprehensive inventory of all supported formats (PNG, JPG, SVG, GIF) to plan consolidation and optimization.", "toolContext": "Using vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory with multi-format pattern to audit all image assets. Complete inventory supports decisions on format standardization and CDN optimization.", "primaryGoal": "Create complete media asset inventory", "subgoal": "Catalog all image files by format type"}, "query": "*.{png,jpg,svg,gif}", "paths": ["/images"]}
Please create a logs directory at the root of the project for centralized logging.

tool_call: vaultManager_createFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732111300000_j4k5l6m7n", "workspaceId": "ws_1732111300000_n7o8p9q0r", "sessionDescription": "Creating logs folder", "sessionMemory": "Application logging infrastructure needs centralization. Currently logs scattered across 3 locations (src/logs, dist/logs, temp/logs). Root-level logs directory will consolidate all output and simplify CI/CD pipelines.", "toolContext": "Creating /logs directory at project root to establish centralized logging location. This organizational change enables unified log monitoring, rotation policies, and easier debugging across deployment environments.", "primaryGoal": "Establish centralized application logging", "subgoal": "Create root-level logs directory"}, "path": "/logs"}
Can you search for all TODO and FIXME comments in our source code? I want to create a task list.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732111500000_l6m7n8o9p", "workspaceId": "ws_1732111500000_p9q0r1s2t", "sessionDescription": "Finding TODOs", "sessionMemory": "Code review identified 34 untracked TODOs scattered across 8 files. Some dating back to v2.0 release with unclear context. Planning to consolidate into project management system with priority assignments and owner accountability.", "toolContext": "Searching for TODO and FIXME markers to extract outstanding work items. This task inventory enables prioritization, prevents duplicate effort, and surfaces forgotten improvements.", "primaryGoal": "Create actionable task list from code comments", "subgoal": "Find and catalog all TODO/FIXME markers"}, "query": "TODO:|FIXME:|HACK:", "paths": ["/src"], "limit": 100}
Please list the contents of the scripts directory so I can review what automation we have.

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732112000000_q1r2s3t4u", "workspaceId": "ws_1732112000000_u4v5w6x7y", "sessionDescription": "Listing scripts", "sessionMemory": "Scripts directory inventory needed for deployment automation assessment. Previous team added undocumented build scripts. Need comprehensive listing to identify duplicate automation and consolidate build pipeline.", "toolContext": "Using vaultManager_listDirectory to enumerate available automation scripts. Full inventory helps identify which scripts are active, which are legacy, and where consolidation opportunities exist.", "primaryGoal": "Audit and consolidate automation scripts", "subgoal": "List all scripts in scripts directory"}, "path": "/scripts"}
Can you append the list of contributors to our CREDITS file? I want to acknowledge everyone who helped.

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732112600000_w7x8y9z0a", "workspaceId": "ws_1732112600000_a0b1c2d3e", "sessionDescription": "Adding credits", "sessionMemory": "Project reached v2.0 milestone with significant external contributions. 23 community members contributed code, documentation, and testing. Using append operation to preserve existing contributors list from v1.x while adding new names.", "toolContext": "Using contentManager_appendContent to add contributor names to CREDITS.md. Append strategy preserves version history and existing acknowledgments while honoring new contributors.", "primaryGoal": "Acknowledge community contributions", "subgoal": "Add new contributor names to CREDITS file"}, "filePath": "/CREDITS.md", "content": "

## Contributors 2024
- Alice Johnson
- Bob Smith
- Carol Williams"}

This separation maintains codebase cleanliness while preserving historical code for audit and rollback scenarios.", "primaryGoal": "Clean up codebase after migration", "subgoal": "Archive legacy implementation files"}, "path": "/src/legacy-handler.js", "newPath": "/archive/legacy-handler.js"}

Can you help me search for performance bottlenecks in our code?

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732119100000_j2k3l4m5n", "workspaceId": "ws_1732119100000_m4n5o6p7q", "sessionDescription": "Finding bottlenecks", "sessionMemory": "Performance profiling identified 3-second latency in user list rendering.
